name: Fear The Abyss
description:
Background

You are a lone sailor armed with a harpoon gun going down to the boiler room when something awful happens. You must fight your way to the top deck in order to uncover the mystery of what terrible events have occurred. Can you survive or will you learn to Fear the Abyss?

Controls

W to aim up

W and A or D to aim diagonally 

Mouse to shoot harpoon

A or D to move

S to crouch

E or Mouse to progress dialogue 

Playtest Questionnaire

Kindly fill out the following form so that we can improve our game for the future :).
